column4: i want to dual boot xp and my ubuntu and i have xp but its saved as a daa file.  i converted it to iso and burned it to a disk but it just burned the daa file and it is still unreadable
anyone know where i can download an xp that can be read
i had someone give me a copy of xp
converting from daa to iso made it ubootable. try to burn the .dee file on a disk
